unittitle_ssm: Curtis and Linda Hoffman Collection on the University Heights Campus Closing
abstract_ssm: Curtis and Linda Hoffman are alumni of the New York University at the University Heights campus. This collection consists of a button and the lyrics of "Bye-Bye University Heights" written for Senior Day in 1973.
collection_ssm: Curtis and Linda Hoffman Collection on the University Heights Campus Closing
